name: Addon kudos error for AO3 Theme AO3 dark for OLED
description:
Check out the original style at userstyles.org
This is an addon for the 'AO3 dark for OLED screens' theme. It changes the Kudos error messages from default and makes them more readable within the theme. The Kudos error color is now dark purple/pinkish to both indicate that it's an error, grab your attention, and be more readable on a black background.
additional_info: Credit: Original theme is AO3 dark for OLED screens by mfz0
